verbs.description: [ARG1: synagogue rampage suspect] [V: indicted] [ARGM-TMP: as funerals continue] the suspect in the pittsburgh synagogue massacre was indicted by a federal grand jury wednesday and members of a grief - stricken jewish community endured another round of funerals for victims of the worst robert bowers attorney rabbi jeffrey myers dr donald yealy jewish community center joyce fienberg rosenthals shayna marcus israeli ambassador ron dermer rodef shalom bill peduto cecil david rosenthal dr jerry rabinowitz synagogue howard fienberg hiv paris pittsburgh synagogue chairman melvin wax irving younger president donald trump dr abe friedman vienna diane hirt squirrel hill robin faulkner scott brady upmc pittsburgh u s virginia anthony dr jerry rabinowitz funeral of fienberg president robert libman paul carberry daniel stein donald trump gov tom wolf pennsylvania officer jared kushner ivanka tree of life
